content.rendered:
Directed by Raja Ramamurthy

Written by Raja Ramamurthy

Star Akshara Haasan (Pavithra). Usha Uthup (Charukesi). Anjana Jayaprakash (Rathi). Janaki Sabesh (Naidu Aunty). Kalairani (Window Aunty). Shalini Vijayakumar (Jessica). Siddhartha Shankar (Harish). Suresh Chandra Menon (Baradwaj). George Maryan (Manikandan)

Language Tamil

Producers Trendloud

Production Trendloud
